name: More Great Episodes From Classic TV Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: In the 'Dick Van Dyke Show', Rob was upset when a picture of Laura was hung in a museum. He was upset because in the picture she is...?
In the 'Honeymooners', Ralph gets into trouble when he boasts to his boss that he is an expert at ...?
In 'MASH', Alan Alda encounters a girl friend from his past. She is played by ..?
In 'Cheers', Frasier and Lilith finally hear their baby's first word. What is it?
In the 'Mary Tyler Moore Show', Phyllis is upset because her husband is having an affair with...?
In 'Star Trek', the ship is 'attacked' by individuals who have 'accelerated' to a faster way of living. One of these people is ...?
questions.explanation:
Kathie Browne.

	She looked fine, too.

questions.text: In 'The Odd Couple', Felix tries to resurrect a song that he wrote:
questions.explanation:
Let's Hit Hitler.

	Jaye P Morgan was the guest star.

questions.text: In 'Three's Company', Jack embarrasses himself while gambling (and winning) at a high society party. He doesn't end up with a lot of money, however, because...?
questions.correct: He isn't playing for real money
options: He loses it on his last play
questions.explanation:
He isn't playing for real money.

	Ritter was funny in that show - they all were.

questions.text: In 'Mission Impossible', Greg Morris gets in trouble and must hide out. He is befriended by a woman who ...?
questions.explanation:
Cannot speak.

	None of the actors in this show ever did better work than in this series.

questions.text: In 'Frasier', the three Cranes go away for a weekend with Daphne and one of her friends. The episode becomes amusing when a man that they meet there mistakenly believes that Niles is...?
questions.explanation:
Gay.

	This is a classic farce, quite well done.
